com.opencredo.concursus.domain.commands.dispatching

Interface CommandLog

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Slf4jCommandLog

    public interface CommandLog
    An object which knows how to log command requests and results.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Command logCommand(Command command)
      Log that the supplied Command was issued.
      void logCommandResult(CommandResult commandResult)
      Log that the supplied CommandResult was returned.
      static CommandLog loggingTo(java.util.function.Consumer<Command> requestLogger, java.util.function.Consumer<CommandResult> resultLogger)
      Create a command log using the supplied Consumers to handle command requests and results.
      void logProcessedCommand(Command processedCommand)
      Log that the supplied Command was issued.

    • Method Detail

      • loggingTo

        static CommandLog loggingTo(java.util.function.Consumer<Command> requestLogger,
                            java.util.function.Consumer<CommandResult> resultLogger)
        Create a command log using the supplied Consumers to handle command requests and results.
        Parameters:
        requestLogger - The Consumer to log command requests with.
        resultLogger - The Consumer to log command results with.
        Returns:
        The constructed CommandLog.

      • logCommand

        default Command logCommand(Command command)
        Log that the supplied Command was issued.
        Parameters:
        command - The Command to log.
        Returns:
        The logged Command, with a processing id attached.

      • logProcessedCommand

        void logProcessedCommand(Command processedCommand)
        Log that the supplied Command was issued.
        Parameters:
        processedCommand - The Command to log.

      • logCommandResult

        void logCommandResult(CommandResult commandResult)
        Log that the supplied CommandResult was returned.
        Parameters:
        commandResult - The CommandResult to log.
